This is the best game I have ever played in my life.
We're able to map, mod and basically almost everything we want to, the game and engine are old (2004), but the graphics are sweet for a game from 10 years ago, there is a very low amount of bugs and glitches, and most of them are being able to fix by server plugins.
This is a perfect game, every CS:S gamemode (expect for TTT and RP) are better there than how they would be if they'd be in Garry's Mod which is supposed to be an "ultra mod" game.

i play this on maxed out graphical setting and resolution (1280x1024) and the fps most of the time is 80-90or 95 and at bad times and depending on the map it droppes down to 20-30- or 45. Morall of the story: buy a better graphics card xD
ps: why valve didn't make an offical tralier :| 

                                                            i am ging it 9.7/10

EDIT: he came all the way from ivy out middle and through our connector, thr through ivy out middle and through our connector like a speed demon.

Juego increible, con muy buenos graficos y un engine diferenciado. No esperen lo mismo que el Clasico CS 1.6, ya que Source tiene su estilo unico, que no es mejor ni peor: Simplemente Diferente. A mi gusto, lo siento un poco mas pesado, mas lento tal vez. No se si trata de emular algo mas de realismo, pero lo recomiendo!
godt FPS-spil, med mange muligheder og baner, godt valg når man skal spille med vennerne! :)

This game is definitley a classic. It seems to run extremley well on almost any computer, whether it be a laptop or a desktop. The graphics are pretty good, and the game never crashes or anything like that. The FPS is always high. Also, this game can be used for other games like Garry's Mod. I fyou have GMod, and even if you don't want to play C.S. Source, it is still very important that you have it.

the best game on steam of all time.

Generally, when looking for a game, you expect there to be a certain amount for the newcomers to get into, E.G  tutorials or begginers servers. But, due to the control scheme of this game, its just pick up and play, the controls are that simple.

Maps are generally well rounded and there are maps which constantly force you to stratagise with teammates in order to win, going solo is not an option. Weapons gradually get more expensive to the degree of their power and rate of fire.

This is by all means, not an easy game and when you look on the face of it, not a very deep one, but look deeper! This is one of those masterful gems hidden in plain sight with some of the easiest control schemes and deep strategy. A must buy!

Игра — шедевр! Лучший из мною виданных шутеров, положивший начало киберспорту. В игре нет ничего лишнего, все сбалансировано и все игроки равноправны, что дает показать свое истинное мастерство и стратегию игры. 10 из 10
